string.name: pin_entered_wrong_wait
string.comment: Parameters: %1$s: Number of seconds to wait

resources.string:
Do you really want to force close the channel with:

%1$s

Your funds will be locked up for %2$s.
Sinun täytyy ensin asettaa lompakko, jotta voit nähdä identiteettisi ja kuvakkeesi.
Vastaanottaaksesi Bitcoinia salamaverkon kautta, sinun pitää ensin avata kanavia.

To receive Bitcoin over the lightning network, at least one of your channels needs some balance on your counterpartys side.

To achieve that, you have to spend something on lightning network first.

In the manage channels area you can always see how much you are able to send or receive over the lightning network right now.

Jos kopioit tämän datan leikepöydälle, muut sovellukset (myös vahingolliset) pystyvät lukemaan ja muokkaamaan sitä. 

Varmistuaksesi että kopioidut tiedot eivät ole muuttuneet, vertaa alkuosaa:

%1$s

Jos kopioit tämän datan leikepöydälle, muut sovellukset (myös vahingolliset) pystyvät lukemaan ja muokkaamaan sitä. 

Varmistuaksesi että kopioidut tiedot eivät ole muuttuneet, vertaa loppua:

%1$s
Tarkista aina viimeiset 3-5 numeroa kun lopioit leikepöydältä. Haitallinen sovellus on voinut muuttaa osoitetta huomaamatta taustalla.
If not scrambled it is easy to guess your PIN just by watching your finger movements.

If you allow screen recording, malicious software might be able to record a video or take screenshots while you are using Zap. We recommend to deactivate this only while you want to record a video or take a screenshot.

string.name: guardian_highOnChainFee
string.comment: Parameters are: %1$s%%: % of transaction value. E.g: 13.2%

resources.string:
You are about to pay %1$s%% in network fees.

Possible solutions:
- try a lightning payment instead
- select lower fee, wait longer
- try again later
- transact a bigger amount

Do you want to continue anyway?

string.name: guardian_oldExchangeRate
string.comment: Parameters are: %1$s: Number of hours. E.g: 7.5

resources.string:
You requested an amount as fiat value, but your exchange rate data is old (retrieved %1$s hours ago).
Make sure you have an internet connection or consider requesting directly in Bitcoin.

Do you want to continue anyway?

Are you sure you want to connect to 

%1$s

Please check the hostname carefully.

You are about to open a link with sensitive data in your browser. While Zap anonymizes all your traffic with the Tor network, your browser does not. If you want to keep this data private use a Tor browser to open the link.
Please update.\n\nThe node you are connected to runs an old version of LND. Versions below %1$s are no longer actively supported.
Kun aktivoitu, klikkaa Zap-logoa pääsivulla nähdäksesi saldosi.
Muutoksen myötä Zap uudelleenkäynnistetään. Haluatko jatkaa?
Include route hints for private channels in invoices

string.name: error_blockExplorer_message
string.comment: Parameters are: %1$s: Name of selected block explorer, %2$s: 'mainnet' or 'testnet'

resources.string: "Your currently selected block explorer (%1$s) does not support %2$s. \nPlease go to settings and choose another block explorer to continue."
Invalid payment information.\n\nPlease use a Bitcoin address or Lightning payment request to initiate a payment.
You are connected to TESTNET. Please use TESTNET addresses or payment requests.
You are connected to MAINNET. Please use MAINNET addresses or payment requests.
You are connected to REGTEST network. Please use REGTEST addresses or payment requests.
To scan QR-Codes you have to allow Zap to use the camera.
Your clipboard does not contain any payment data.
Your clipboard does not contain any connection data.
Unable to read QR-Code, please try again.

Unsupported connection format.
Please use one of the following formats:

- Lndconnect string (lndconnect://...)
- BtcPay Server connection (config=...)
- Full content of your BTCPay Server config file
Could not fetch configuration from BTCPay Server.

Invalid lndconnect string.
Please make sure you used the following format:

lndconnect://<ip>:<port>?cert=<...>&macaroon=<...>
Your connection information does not contain a macaroon. This is mandatory.
The provided host or port is invalid.

Timeout.
The server is not responding.

- Please make sure you have a good internet connection

- Please make sure the server is running and still has the following IP:

%1$s

Hostname verification failed.

The hostname of your connection does not match the hostname provided in the certificate.

 You might have to recreate your certificate. Make sure the hostname is added to the lnd.conf as tlsextradomain before recreating it.
Host (%1$s) cannot be resolved.\n\nPlease update your wallet connection settings if your node is now reachable under a different address or hostname.

Unable to connect to LND.

- make sure the LND daemon is running on your server.

- make sure your port forwarding is active. (Port: %1$s)
Unable to reach the host.\n\nPlease make sure you have internet connection.
Tor connection failed.\n Please turn on Tor in the apps settings.
Tor was unable to bootstrap.\n\nZap Android now natively supports Tor. If you use Orbot, please remove Zap from Orbot\'s Tor activated list or shutdown Orbot completely.
JSON syntax of the BTCPay server configuration is invalid.
The BTCPay server configuration does not contain a BTC GRPC configuration.
The node is reachable but returns an internal error. This error might be caused by using a wrong port.

The node is reachable but returns an internal error. This error might be caused by using a wrong port. As you are trying to connect to a Node on clearnet, disabling Tor in the app settings might also solve your problem.

Invalid format.
Please use one of the following:
- pubkey
- pubkey@host
- pubkey@host:port
- LNURL-Channel
The wallet needs to be setup to open a channel.
Could not establish connection to peer node.
Connection has been refused by peer.
Cannot connect to node without IP-address or host.
Could not connect to peer within deadline.
Number of pending channels exceed maximum.
Channel could not be opened within deadline.
Could not open channel with connected node: %s
Peers could not be fetched within deadline.
Peer is offline. Only force close allowed.
Channel could not be closed within deadline.
It looks like someone tried to deactivate your PIN. The App will close now.\nYou can reinstall the app and use the recovery process to regain access to your funds.
An empty name is not allowed.
The payment details did not match the details specified by the invoice you are trying to pay.
Timeout. No route could be found.
No route could be found for the desired payment. Opening new lightning channels might solve the problem.
The amount to pay is bigger than what you can send over lightning with your current open channels.
Please make sure the recipient has enabled the keysend feature.
Only payment data is allowed here.
Your wallet is not fully synced yet. Please try again later.
Fee limit for payments above %1$d sats: %2$s
The fee for this payment (%1$.1f%%) exceeds the limit specified in the settings (%2$.0f%%).\n\nDo you really want to pay this invoice?
The fee for this payment (%1$d sats) will be higher than the payment amount (%2$d sats).\n\nDo you really want to pay this invoice?
In order to use this feature, you have to setup biometric authentication in your Android system settings.
The app has been reset as the last update included some structural changes.\nUnfortunately you will have to go through the setup process again.

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- Bitcoin Address
- Bitcoin Payment Request
- Lightning Payment Request

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- pubkey
- pubkey@host
- pubkey@host:port
- LNURL-Channel

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- pubkey
- pubkey@host
- pubkey@host:port

QR-Codes containing the following are valid:

- Lndconnect string (lndconnect://...)
- BtcPay Server connection (config=...)
- Full content of your BTCPay Server config file

Lightning:

+ instant
+ low fees
- not always possible

Perfect for small transactions.
Use whenever possible.


On-Chain:

+ always possible
- slower
- higher fees

Good for big transactions.
Use this when Lightning is not possible.
Anything is allowed here.\nJust scan a QR-Code and Zap will automatically determine which action to take depending on the data.
Private channels are not more secure, they are just not visible for the network.\nOnly use private channels when your node is run on a mobile device or it is frequently offline.

This is your identity on the lightning network.

When you tap on your avatar image you will reveal a QR-Code.
Others can scan that code and add you to their contacts, open channels with your or send money to you.

This avatar is unique.
It was automatically generated based on your public key and cannot be changed.
Do you really want to delete this wallet?
This wallet already exists.\nIf you want to update its connection data, please go to the wallets detail page.
The data does not contain a valid LNURL.
The withdraw amount is bigger than what you can receive over lightning with your current open channels.
The Service you are interacting with provided invalid data.
Do you really want to open a channel with:
The channel is opening. This may take a while.\nYou can check the channels state in your channels overview.
The amount to pay is bigger than what you can send over lightning with your current open channels.
Your payment was successful, but the secret that you received could not be decrypted.
IMPORTANT:\nThe URL has been copied to your clipboard. Please save it if you need it later. This dialog won\'t be shown again.
IMPORTANT:\nThe code has been copied to your clipboard. Please save it if you need it later. This dialog won\'t be shown again.
REST (port 8080) is not supported.\n\nDo you want to change the port to 10009 (gRPC)?
Found a bug? Let us know!
Tap on your Avatar to reveal your identity!
Block explorers are not available in REGTEST mode.
Clipboard data found, but it is invalid:
Your clipboard contains payment information. Do you want to initiate a payment?
Your clipboard contains LNURL data. Do you want to use it?
Your clipboard contains a node public key. Do you want to open a channel?
Your clipboard contains connection data. Do you want to add a new wallet?
This person is already in your contacts!
The total amount of funds held in this channel. Due to some constraints (like commit fee or local channel reserve) not all of the funds are spendable.

The total percentage of sent and received funds divided by the total capacity of the channel. A channel with an activity over 100\% means that more funds traveled through the channel than it can hold. This metric is designed to show how effective a given channel is.
This shows how long this channel already exists.
A channel can be public or private. Private channels are not more secure, they are just not visible to the network.
The amount to be paid in fees when closing the channel. This can change over time as the fees are subject to the transaction fees of the bitcoin base layer.
In the event of an uncooperative close (force close) of this channel, the time lock is the number of blocks you will have to wait before you can access your funds again.

The fees you will receive when you forward a transaction through this channel. The total fee you will receive is the sum of the base fee (in msat) and the fee rate.\nThe base fee is what you get for each forwarding, no matter what the amount of the transaction is.\nThe fee rate depends on the amount of the transaction.

The fees the other node will receive when it forwards a transaction through this channel. This only applies to forwarding transactions. You will not have to pay anything if you use this channel for your transactions.

The minimum amount this node is required to reserve in this channels balance. You will not be able to spend this amount. This makes sure you will always have something to lose if you try to cheat your channel partner.
The minimum amount the other node is required to reserve in this channels balance. This makes sure the other node will always have something to lose it tries to cheat you.
